definitions: openly show contempt or a lack of respect for someone or something

examples.text: the title was a deliberate attempt to cock a snook at the establishment
he spent a lifetime cocking a snook at the art world

shortDefinitions: openly show contempt or lack of respect

definitions: place one's hand so that the thumb touches one's nose and the fingers are spread out, in order to express contempt.
shortDefinitions: place one's hand so that thumb touches one's nose and fingers are spread out
